backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a warm color theme, dark mode variables, and base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page assembling hero, about, featured content, social links, and navigation sections.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLink.tsx: Reusable external link wrapper adding safe link attributes and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedGrid.tsx: Grid component that displays featured video and playlist cards using provided content data.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with navigation links and YouTube subscribe CTA for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/SocialLinks.tsx: Renders social link buttons with icons using the socialLinks content list.
frontend/src/content/channelContent.ts: TypeScript data definitions and arrays for featured content items and social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing because backend has no query methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and warm-themed light/dark design tokens and global UI behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind, theme extensions, custom colors bound to CSS variables, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and image needs for the website build.
